nodes.documentation:
@title CompoundPoolController
@dev This library handles deposits to and withdrawals from dYdX liquidity pools.
nodes.name: CompoundPoolController

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the fund's balance of the specified currency in the Compound pool.
We would simply be using balanceOfUnderlying, but exchangeRateCurrent is nonReentrant, which causes us issues.
nodes.name: getBalance
approve
deposit

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Amount must be greater than to 0."

arguments.value: Amount must be greater than to 0.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Amount must be greater than to 0."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Error calling redeemUnderlying on Compound cToken: error code not equal to 0"

arguments.value: Error calling redeemUnderlying on Compound cToken: error code not equal to 0

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Error calling redeemUnderlying on Compound cToken: error code not equal to 0"

nodes.name: withdraw

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Error calling redeem on Compound cToken: error code not equal to 0"

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Error calling redeem on Compound cToken: error code not equal to 0"

nodes.documentation:
@dev Withdraws all funds from the Compound pool.
@return Boolean indicating success.
nodes.name: withdrawAll
